description: Try our easy to follow Mexican Chicken Tortillas with Avocado recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mexican Chicken Tortillas with Avocado Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Halve avocado and discard the stone. Scoop out the flesh into a bowl and roughly mash. Stir through the lemon juice and chilli. Spoon on top of chicken mixture. Sprinkle over black pepper. Serve.
